      • reconcile

        public String reconcile(ReconciliationService.ReconAction reconAction,
                        org.forgerock.json.JsonValue mapping,
                        Boolean synchronous,
                        org.forgerock.json.JsonValue reconParams,
                        org.forgerock.json.JsonValue config)
                 throws org.forgerock.json.resource.ResourceException
        Reconcile the given mapping according to the requested options
        Specified by:
        reconcile in interface Reconcile
        Parameters:
        reconAction - the recon action
        mapping - the mapping configuration
        synchronous - whether to synchronously (TRUE) wait for the reconciliation run, or to return immediately (FALSE) with the recon id, which can then be used for subsequent queries / actions on that reconciliation run.
        reconParams - all parameters passed to the recon invocation
        config - the overriding config
        Throws:
        org.forgerock.json.resource.ResourceException
